title: Navigate forwards to a not pressed toggle button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Mute' button.

title: Navigate backwards to a not pressed toggle button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Mute' button.

title: Navigate forwards to a pressed toggle button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Mute' button.

title: Navigate backwards to a pressed toggle button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Mute' button.

title: Request information about a not pressed toggle button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Mute' button, read information about the button.

title: Request information about a pressed toggle button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Mute' button, read information about the button.

title: Operate a not pressed toggle button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Mute' button, activate the button.

title: Operate a pressed toggle button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Mute' button, activate the button.
